description:
On planet Arlia, Vegeta and Nappa become prisoners of the tyrant king who rules the planet. After a brief scuffle with the monster Yeddy, the Arlians realize that the two Saiyans are more than they can handle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Os guerreiros mais fortes do Universo! O despertar dos Sayajins
Uchuu Ichi no Kyou Senshi Saiyajin Mezameru!
ชาวไซย่าลืมตาขึ้นมาแล้ว
宇宙一の強戦士サイヤ人めざめる!
